00034 class SMHttpConsumerExample : public edm::EDAnalyzer {
00035 public:
00036    explicit SMHttpConsumerExample( const edm::ParameterSet& );
00037    ~SMHttpConsumerExample();
00038    
00039   void analyze( const edm::Event&, const edm::EventSetup& );
00040 
00041   void endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock const& lumiSeg,
00042                           edm::EventSetup const& eSetup);
00043   void endRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup);

00047 private:
00048   // event counter
00049   int counter;

00053 SMHttpConsumerExample::SMHttpConsumerExample( const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig )
00054   : counter(0)
00055 {
00056 }

00059 SMHttpConsumerExample::~SMHttpConsumerExample()
00060 {
00061 }

00063 void SMHttpConsumerExample::endJob()
00064 {
00065   std::cout << "Doing end of job processing after reading " 
00066             << counter << " events" << std::endl;
00067 }

00075 void SMHttpConsumerExample::analyze(const edm::Event& iEvent, 
00076              const edm::EventSetup& iSetup )
00077 {   
00078   ++counter;
00079 }

00081 void SMHttpConsumerExample::endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock const& lumiSeg, 
00082                                             edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00083 {
00084   std::cout << "Doing end of lumi processing for lumi number "
00085             << lumiSeg.luminosityBlock() << " of run " 
00086             << lumiSeg.run() << std::endl;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void SMHttpConsumerExample::endRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00090 {
00091   std::cout << "Doing end of run processing for run number "
00092             <<  run.run() << std::endl;
00093 }
